</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 204 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)

</column>

---

Your knowledge of items' construction allows you to discern their magical effects as well. You can use [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) instead of a skill associated with a magic tradition to [Identify Magic](/Actions.aspx?ID=24) on magic items, though not on any other sorts of magic.
